title: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: The date/time value is not stored correctly in the report design when an invalid date string, such as '55/66/9999', is entered in the 'default value' field of a 'DateTime' type report parameter in the BIRT report designer.
EB: The date value should have been validated by the UI or Model to reject invalid date strings like '55/66/9999' before storing them in the report design.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the BIRT report designer.
2. Create a new report parameter of type 'DateTime'.
3. Enter an invalid date string, such as '55/66/9999', in the 'default value' field.
4. Save the report design.
5. Verify that the invalid date value is incorrectly stored in the report design.
